-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Haskell SuperCollider SoundFile
--   
@package hsc3-sf-hsndfile
@version 0.15


-- | Read and write sound files using hsndfile.
module Sound.File.HSndFile

-- | Sound file meta data.
data Header
Header :: Int -> Int -> Double -> Header
channelCount :: Header -> Int
frameCount :: Header -> Int
sampleRate :: Header -> Double

-- | Duration of sound file in seconds.
duration :: Header -> Double

-- | Read <a>Header</a> of sound file.
header :: FilePath -> IO Header

-- | Read <a>Header</a> and audio channel data from sound file.
read :: FilePath -> IO (Header, [[Double]])
instance Eq Header
instance Show Header
